Reference

Import and Clean data

pupil_read()

Convert "messy" raw data file to "tidy" raw data file

pupil_merge()

Merge multiple files together

set_stimuli()

Create a column of current stimulus period

set_trial()

Set correct trial indexing

set_timing()

Set timing relative to trial-onset

select_eye()

Select eye to keep for analysis

Preprocessing Methods

pupil_preprocess()

Preprocess pupil data using this single function

pupil_deblink()

Evaluate the amount of missing data

pupil_smooth()

Apply smoothing/low frequency filter

pupil_interpolate()

Apply interpolation

pupil_baselinecorrect()

Apply baseline correction

pupil_missing()

Evaluate the amount of missing data

pupil_downsample()

Downsample pupil data

Visualize

plot_comparison()

Visually compare timeseries that used different preprocessing mehtods/parameters
